meanings.definition: A game played on a lawn, in which wooden balls are driven through a series of wickets using mallets.
meanings.sent1: During the picnic, we set up a croquet game on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered in the backyard to enjoy a friendly game of croquet.
meanings.sent3: The croquet match became intense as players strategized to hit the ball through the wickets.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in croquet was like a skilled artist painting on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the mallet striking the croquet ball echoed across the lawn.

meanings.definition: To play the game of croquet.
meanings.sent1: We decided to croquet in the park on a sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent2: She taught her little brother how to croquet properly.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors laughed as they watched us croquet awkwardly.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm to croquet was contagious, and soon everyone joined in.
meanings.sent5: As the sun began to set, we continued to croquet under the fading light.
